page.title: 12A MOUNTAIN WALK
page.content: Where I live there are many mountains, this is because I live in a valley near the{Brecon Beacons.}The most attractive feature of Crickhowell is the{Table Mountain}which overlooks the town.{Crickhowell}is my town,deriving its name from a person called{Howell who lived on the Table Mountain in a large{Fort.}It is so quiet up in the mountains,you can shut your eyes and imagine you are{anywhere}or{anyone. Also you feel as though you can touch the clouds in the sky.Often when I feel sad or miserable I go for a long walk up the mountain and escape from the problems and realities of life.It is almost as though,a{perspex wall}is erected between yourself and the town below. The river and mountain streams flow freely and often{squirrels}and {rabbits}are to be seen around the mountainside.
